name: Swabodhini Charitable Trust
briefDescription: Swabodhini Charitable Trust is Located in Chennai, Tamil Nadu.It wholly and as a single purpose manages the Swabodhini School for Special Children. The school was started in 1989 and currently has 50 students from age 4-28 years.Our aim is to provide special education and vocational training to students with autism and related challenges and help them integrate into main stream society, thereby enabling them lead an independent and dignified life.
